headline: Kevin McCarthy condemns Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar for attending 'appalling and wrong' white nationalist event: 'This is unacceptable'
author: Bryan Metzger
sentences: Republican House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy offered a rare rebuke of two members of his caucus on Monday, saying it was "unacceptable" for Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia and Paul Gosar of Arizona to speak at an event held by a man widely described to be white nationalist.

The former has quickly become a thorn in the side of GOP leadership for her outrageous remarks, while the latter was censured by the House in November for releasing an anime video that depicted him killing Democratic Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez on New York.
